Tagline: Turn-Key Radiation Effects Test Services | Radiation Tolerance Screening of COTS Parts | DLA Laboratory Suitability
Overview:
VPT Radiation Laboratory and Test Services (VPT Rad®) is an Independent, DLA Approved Radiation and Test Services Laboratory Offering:
- Turnkey, Integrated Radiation Effects Test Development and Engineering Solutions 
- Total Ionizing Dose (TID) Gamma Irradiation
- High Dose Rate (HDR) TID GC-220
- Low-Dose Rate (LDR) Broad Beam TID Irradiation
- ELDRS Analysis
- TESEC 881-TT Discrete Test System
- LTX D10 Mix Signal Test system
- DLA Laboratory Suitability for both MIL-STD 750 & 883
Associated Members: 10 associated membersLinkedIn members who’ve listed VPT Rad as their current workplace on their profile.
Specialties: Biomedical Device Sterilization, RHA test solutions, Turn-key test solutions, ELDRS Analysis, High Dose Rate (HDR) TID, and Low Dose Rate (LDR) TID
